img.title: YISD 2020 Health Fair pictures in the District Photo Gallery
img.alt: A new day is dawning on Yorktown ISD

span.p: Athletic equipment drop-off will be on Monday May 4th from 8:00-10:00 AM, coinciding with packet pickup and meal delivery.
All workout clothes, uniforms, and athletic equipment will be collected at that time.
Yorktown students can come pick up their medication 8am to 10am on the following dates: Friday, April 24; Monday, April 27; Wednesday, April 29; Friday, May 1.
***All medications must be picked up by a parent or guardian***
ALL Medications still at the school after May 1, 2020 will be discarded
Please contact Ms. Romans @ mromans@yisd.org for any questions

p.span: Parents, please read this update regarding COVID-19.

span.p: YISD May 2, 2020 School Board Elections Postponed.
The board of trustees at a Special Meeting held on April 1, 2020 voted to postpone the May 2 school elections to November 3, 2020 as per the Governor Abbott's executive order due to the COVID 19.
